name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **React**, **TypeScript**, and **Next.js**. Proficient in modern frontend technologies including **Contentful**, **Jest**, **React Testing Library**, **Cypress**, **Webpack**, **Vite**, and **GraphQL**. Strong experience in deploying scalable applications on **AWS** and utilizing **Vercel** for hosting. Proven ability to create user-friendly interfaces with frameworks like **Material UI** and **Tailwind**, while maintaining development efficiency through **Storybook**.
Additionally, I bring extensive experience in backend development using **Python** with frameworks such as **FastAPI** and **Django**, and have a solid foundation in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics. I am committed to compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My expertise also extends to MLOps practices, deploying effective CI/CD pipelines to enhance productivity.
